# Project: STBA Pontianak

## Tech Stack
- **Framework:** Laravel 12
- **Admin Panel:** Filament v4
  - Documentation: https://filamentphp.com/docs/4.x/introduction/installation
- **Database:** MySQL
- **Environment:** Laragon

## Guidelines
- **IMPORTANT:** Always check existing files first before writing code. Read the file content to understand the context and ensure correctness.
